subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The fifth seed Mardy Fish defeated Frank Dancevic of Canada, 6-7 (6), 6-4, 6-4, on Friday to reach the semifinals at the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.
snippet: The fifth seed Mardy Fish defeated Frank Dancevic of Canada, 6-7 (6), 6-4, 6-4, on Friday to reach the semifinals at the Hall of Fame Tennis Championships in Newport, R.I.
